snippet: Officials emphasized that there is no credible information on any threats, but will increase their vigilance at selected airports abroad.
abstract: Federal authorities increase their vigilance at selected airports abroad, even though there is no evidence of threats against the United States tied to one-year anniversary of Osama Bin Laden's death.
lead_paragraph: Officials emphasized that there is no credible information on any threats, but will increase their vigilance at selected airports abroad.

headline.main: Bin Laden Death Anniversary Prompts Increased Security
headline.print_headline: Bin Laden Death Anniversary Prompts Increased Security

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
